languages.text: "Чадам Императора, щедро жертвующим на наш богоугодный поход, мы с охотой даруем частичку благостного света Его, запечатленную в наших реликвиях".

traits.locale_text: "В ответ на пожертвования нашей миссии, я могу даровать вам частичку благостного света Императора, запечатленную в наших реликвиях. Пожалуйста, взгляните".

languages.text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."
languages.original_text: "Чадам Императора, щедро жертвующим на наш богоугодный поход, мы с охотой даруем частичку благостного света Его, запечатленную в наших реликвиях".

traits.locale_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."
"To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."
"To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

"To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."
"To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

languages.text: “对于那些为我们虔诚事业慷慨解囊的帝皇子民，我们很愿意以我们的圣遗物作为答谢。愿帝皇的光芒洒在他们身上。”
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: “对于那些为我们虔诚事业慷慨解囊的帝皇子民，我们很愿意以我们的圣遗物作为答谢。愿帝皇的光芒洒在他们身上。”

languages.text: 「忠誠心から喜んで寄付をしてくださる皇帝子供達よ。あなた達には、聖遺物に埋め込まれた皇帝の恵みの光のかけらを贈ります」
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: 「忠誠心から喜んで寄付をしてくださる皇帝子供達よ。あなた達には、聖遺物に埋め込まれた皇帝の恵みの光のかけらを贈ります」

languages.text: «A los hijos del Emperador que hagan donaciones generosas a nuestra causa, les obsequiaremos con gusto con motas de su bondadosa luz incrustadas en nuestras reliquias».
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: «A los hijos del Emperador que hagan donaciones generosas a nuestra causa, les obsequiaremos con gusto con motas de su bondadosa luz incrustadas en nuestras reliquias».

languages.text: "Den Kindern des Imperators, die großzügig für unsere göttliche Sache spenden, schenken wir gern Funken seines wunderbaren Lichts, in Relikten eingebettet."
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: "Den Kindern des Imperators, die großzügig für unsere göttliche Sache spenden, schenken wir gern Funken seines wunderbaren Lichts, in Relikten eingebettet."

languages.text: « Aux enfants de l'Empereur qui contribuent généreusement à notre cause divine, nous offrons des fragments de Sa lumière incrustés dans nos reliques. »
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: « Aux enfants de l'Empereur qui contribuent généreusement à notre cause divine, nous offrons des fragments de Sa lumière incrustés dans nos reliques. »

languages.text: "İmparator'un, ilahi davamıza cömert bağışlarda bulunan çocuklarına, O'nun yadigârlarımıza işlenmiş lütufkâr ışığının partiküllerini armağan etmekten mutluluk duyuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "To the children of the Emperor who make generous donations to our godly cause, we gladly gift specks of His gracious light embedded in our relics."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un, ilahi davamıza cömert bağışlarda bulunan çocuklarına, O'nun yadigârlarımıza işlenmiş lütufkâr ışığının partiküllerini armağan etmekten mutluluk duyuyoruz."
